00001 #include "misrproj.h"          /* Prototype for this function */
00002 #include "errormacros.h"       /* Error macros */
00003 #include <math.h>          /* Prototype for floor */
00004 
00005 extern int nb;
00006 extern int nl;
00007 extern int ns;
00008 extern float absOffset[NBLOCK];
00009 extern double ulc[2];
00010 extern double lrc[2];
00011 extern double sx;
00012 extern double sy;
00013 extern double xc;
00014 extern double yc;
00015 
00016 #define FUNC_NAMEm "misrfor"
00017 
00018 int misrfor(
00019 const double       x,          /* Output SOM X coordinate */
00020 const double       y,          /* Output SOM Y coordinate */
00021 int*           block,      /* Input block */
00022 float*         line,       /* Input line */
00023 float*         sample      /* Input sample */
00024 )
00025 {
00026   float        i;          /* Intermediate X coordinate */
00027   float        j;          /* Intermediate Y coordinate */
00028   int          b;          /* Intermediate block */
00029   float        l;          /* Intermediate line */
00030   float        s;          /* Intermediate sample */
00031   char         msg[STRLEN];    /* Warning message */
00032 
00033 /* Compute intermediate coordinates */
00034 
00035   i = (float)((x - xc) / sx);
00036   j = (float)((y - yc) / sy);
00037 
00038 /* Check for very small numbers in i and j and assume they are zero */
00039 
00040   i = (fabs(i) < 1E-5 ? 0.0 : i);
00041   j = (fabs(j) < 1E-5 ? 0.0 : j);
00042 
00043 /* Compute block and check range */
00044 
00045   b = (int)(floor((i + 0.5) / nl)) + 1;
00046   if (b < 1 || b > nb) {
00047     sprintf(msg, "block is out of range (1 < %d < %d)", b, nb);
00048     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00049   }
00050 
00051 /* Compute line and check range */
00052 
00053   l = (float)(i - ((b - 1) * nl));
00054   if (l < -0.5 || l > nl - 0.5) {
00055     sprintf(msg, "line is out of range (0 < %e < %d)", l, nl);
00056     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00057   }
00058 
00059 /* Compute sample and check range */
00060 
00061   s = (float)(j - absOffset[b-1]);
00062   if (s < -0.5 || s > ns - 0.5) {
00063     sprintf(msg, "sample is out of range (0 < %e < %d)", s, ns);
00064     WRN_LOG_JUMP(msg);
00065   }
00066 
00067 /* Set return values */
00068 
00069   *block = b;
00070   *line = l;
00071   *sample = s;
00072 
00073   return(0);
00074 
00075  ERROR_HANDLE:
00076 
00077   *block = -1;
00078   *line = -1.0;
00079   *sample = -1.0;
00080   return(1);
00081 }
